========
ML Tools
========


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/ml_htools.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/ml_htools

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/hdmamin/ml_htools.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.org/hdmamin/ml_htools

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/ml-htools/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://ml-htools.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




Utilities for machine learning, mostly using scikit-learn and PyTorch.


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://ml-htools.readthedocs.io.
